welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Wanstead, a charming town known for its picturesque parks, bustling high street, and friendly community. We invite you to immerse yourself in its beauty and discover all that it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport serves all flights and provides a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at London City Airport offers exclusive services for private jet passengers, including VIP lounges and dedicated security screening.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'LCY Free WiFi' from the list of available networks.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Biggin Hill Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northolt Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Northolt Airport caters to VIP and executive flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly European and some long-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly long-haul flights and some domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Serving mainly long-haul and some European flights, this terminal is home to many SkyTeam alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly British Airways and Iberia flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, with a 45-minute time limit per session.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stansted Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: The satellite terminal at Stansted Airport is used for overflow flights and low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rochester Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rochester Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Luton Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 at Luton Airport is a smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Southend Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: The satellite terminal at Southend Airport serves low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Gatwick Airport is the airport's main terminal, serving a variety of airlines and destinations.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Gatwick Airport is the airport's secondary terminal, serving a variety of airlines and destinations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
